LD34 : You can't see but you can feel

-------------------

This is a simple pong game.
You control four block to bounce the ball in order to get score.

Game Goal :
Maximize your score, and challenge yourself.

Control :
"Space" to start the game/return menu.
"W", "A", "S", "D"
"↑", "←", "↓", "→" are used to move blocks.(showed in game)
